begin with orange 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 increase around 12 3 single_crochet increase around 18 4 single_crochet increase single_crochet around 24 5 3 single_crochet increase around 30 6 blo single_crochet around 30 7 8 single_crochet around 30 9 2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet around 36 10 11 single_crochet around 36 12 flo slip_stitch around 36 13 blo single_crochet around 36 14 single_crochet around 36 15 flo slip_stitch around 36 - f/o dirt and stem - begin with brown - stuff as you go - make a slip knot and slide it onto the hook - start working from the unused back loop of the first stitch of round 14 of the pot 16 blo 2 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet around 30 17 3 single_crochet decrease around 24 18 single_crochet decrease single_crochet around 18 19 single_crochet decrease around 12 break off brown and attach green 20 decrease around 6 21 28 single_crochet around 6 -
